creator: mguillemot@yahoo.fr
text:
Using
<mail:header name="X-MyField1">myField1</mail:header>
<mail:header name="X-MyField2">myField2</mail:header>

produces a mail with
X-MyField1: myField1
X-MyField2: myField1

creator: mguillemot@yahoo.fr
text:
Created attachment 10483
Patch fixing the bug against HeaderTag 1.7
